text: <https://github.com/JuliaDocs/Documenter.jl/issues/1177> the jist here is I need to manually create the gh-pages branch? right now deploydocs doesn't create the branch as stated in the documenter docs

text: is this just a lie? `By default, Documenter pushes documentation to the gh-pages branch. If the branch does not exist it will be created automatically by deploydocs.` <https://juliadocs.github.io/Documenter.jl/stable/man/hosting/#gh-pages-Branch>

elements.text: By default, Documenter pushes documentation to the gh-pages branch. If the branch does not exist it will be created automatically by deploydocs.
